useCases.useCase: Generate visual market research and analysis reports for stakeholders

resource.title: Genspark AI: The Next Generation of Search, Research & Creative Tools (2026 Guide) - TechBullion

useCases.notes: Genspark creates comprehensive research reports called 'Sparkpages' that aggregate multiple sources into visual, shareable formats perfect for stakeholder presentations.

useCases.useCase: Compare vendors and products with automatic comparison tables

resource.title: Top 5 Laptop Brands in 2025: Comprehensive Comparison - Genspark Sparkpage

useCases.notes: Genspark automatically generates structured comparison tables (Sparkpages) for products and vendors, aggregating data from multiple sources.

useCases.useCase: Create guides synthesizing industry best practices for workforce optimization

resource.title: Empowering HR: Maximizing Organizational Effectiveness and Workforce Optimization - Genspark Sparkpage

useCases.notes: Real example of a Genspark Sparkpage covering HR best practices, organizational effectiveness, and workforce optimization strategies.

useCases.useCase: Research tech stacks and tools with structured pros/cons comparisons

resource.title: GenSpark AI Browser: The All-in-One AI Platform That Replaces 10+ Tools (2025 Review)

useCases.notes: Comprehensive review showing how Genspark can aggregate multi-model AI responses and create structured comparisons of tools. Genspark includes AI Slides, AI Sheets, AI Docs, AI Developer Tools, AI Designer, and more.

useCases.useCase: Automate lead generation and prospect research with one prompt

resource.title: This NEW AI Tool Automates Lead Gen & Data Analysis with ONE Prompt (Genspark.ai)

useCases.notes: Verified resource explaining how Genspark generates comprehensive lead lists with names, contact details, roles, businesses, lead scores, and personalized outreach templates from a single prompt.

useCases.useCase: Create professional presentations and slide decks from prompts or PDFs

resource.title: AI Presentation Maker: 4 Methods to Create Stunning Slides with Genspark AI

useCases.notes: Medium article covering 4 methods to create presentations with Genspark AI Slides feature. Also available on official Genspark: https://www.genspark.ai/ai_slides_intro

useCases.useCase: Transform data into insights using AI-powered spreadsheets

resource.title: Genspark AI Sheets: Transform Data into Insights in Minutes

useCases.notes: Tutorial on using Genspark AI Sheets for data analysis, organization, and generating actionable insights from spreadsheet data.

useCases.useCase: Plan travel itineraries with comprehensive destination research

resource.title: GenSpark AI vs Traditional Travel Agents

useCases.notes: Article comparing Genspark AI to traditional travel agents. Example Sparkpages exist for travel planning: https://www.genspark.ai/spark/tokyo-family-adventure-a-4-day-itinerary/c05242ee-f2b3-3299-8ed1-1c41c10f7d74

useCases.useCase: Build no-code apps, websites, and tools with AI Developer

resource.title: Genspark AI Developer Tutorial: The No-Code App Builder That Actually Works

useCases.notes: Julian Goldie's tutorial on using Genspark AI Developer to build websites, games, and lead gen tools with zero coding. Follow-up article: https://medium.com/@julian.goldie/genspark-ai-developer-2-0-build-a-real-mobile-app-with-just-one-prompt-04b73546fb43

useCases.useCase: Create AI videos and whiteboard animations for content marketing

resource.title: How To Make Whiteboard Animations For FREE With Genspark AI and Google AI Studio

useCases.notes: Tutorial transcript from WordsAtScale showing how to create whiteboard animations using Genspark AI combined with Google AI Studio.

useCases.useCase: Automate browser tasks with Super Agent (phone calls, emails, bookings)

resource.title: Genspark AI Tutorial - Meet the AI Super Agent (Kevin Stratvert)

useCases.notes: Kevin Stratvert's tutorial introducing Genspark Super Agent capabilities including making phone calls, sending emails, and building slide decks automatically.

resource.title: How I Use ChatGPT + GenSpark to Automate My Browser (Free Udemy Course)

useCases.notes: Free Udemy course on combining ChatGPT with Genspark for browser automation workflows.

useCases.useCase: Complete guide to Genspark AI features and capabilities
useCases.notes: Comprehensive guide covering all Genspark AI features including search, Sparkpages, Super Agent, and creative tools.

keyFeatures: Sparkpages: AI-generated research reports that aggregate multiple sources
Super Agent: Autonomous task execution (calls, emails, bookings)
AI Slides: Presentation creation from prompts or PDFs
AI Sheets: Spreadsheet generation and data analysis
AI Docs: Document creation with multi-model synthesis
AI Developer: No-code app and website builder
AI Image Studio: Image generation and editing
AI Video Tools: Video creation including Clip Genius
Multi-model aggregation: Queries multiple AI models and synthesizes best answers
Deep Research Mode: Comprehensive in-depth analysis
Autopilot Mode: Step-by-step automatic task execution
